name: Pirate Run (Joy Boy Studios)
description:
Pirate Run is and Endless runner Platform type game with the theme of a pirate exploring a dangerous treasure island. The player must venture deep into the island while collecting coins and avoiding the skeleton Monsters and other traps. 

The Game Is Still In Development

CONTROL : 

*Press Space key for jump.

*Press Space key twice for double jump

*Press Left Mouse Button to shoot
